api_list.name: Recipe generator
api_list.description: Powerful tool that leverages the capabilities of AI to provide customized recipes based on the ingredients you have at hand. It even accommodates specific dietary preferences such as keto, vegan, or gluten-free, among others.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipe-generator-create-custom-recipes-from-your-ingredients.p.rapidapi.com/recipe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipe-generator-create-custom-recipes-from-your-ingredients.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
